thread.section_title: Hotel Jardin Le Brea - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 4 Nights in Paris
thread.title_full: 4 Nights in Paris - Review of Hotel Jardin Le Brea, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Felix M
title: 4 Nights in Paris
text:
The Hotel has been recently renovated and is in excellent condition and very beautiful! Staff is very friendly as well. The only minor drawback is that my room (Number 1) only had one power outlet, which made it impossible to charge all of the devices we nowadays carry around over night. I would have also preferred a bottle of water with a glass inside the room over the free Bar at the reception.
All in all value for many was unbeatable in Paris. I'll come back! :)
